name: Ultimate Palm Survival
description:
Ultimate Palm Survival is a comedic spin on Man vs Wild. Your task is to help the palm trees survive, by going toe to toe with the tribe on to the island. Drop coconuts on the villagers to defeat them.

This game was made for Mini Jam 50. The theme of the jam was "Islands" with the limitation that the game could only have 1 level.

The music in the game was made by Marching Dream.

Total development time: 14 hours
